thread.title: AP: California drops plan to let violent inmates fight fires
thread.title_full: AP: California drops plan to let violent inmates fight fires

title: AP: California drops plan to let violent inmates fight fires
text:
Published By: CBS News - Today 
Currently about 3,800 inmates assist professional firefighters in California, but that is down from about 4,400 in previous years...
